entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:06 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 08:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: NE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Snow at times mixed with freezing drizzle early this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
